section.name: Melati Administration System
section.p: The Melati database administration system enables the viewing and editing of records in a database, offering the same functionality as Access over the web. In addition the system can be used to administrate user's authorisations, upload files or download CSV summaries of tables.
Additional functionality can be plugged into the standard interface.
